Articles.Content: During each flight I find a few things about my craft that can be improved so I keep a note pad at my desk to jot down these changes that I would like to make. My Suggestion would be to have a note pad that could be incorporated on the screen which could be minimized and saved with that craft. When the mission has ended and the craft is loaded for the next launch these notes can be used to make those tweaks.
Play windowed ("windowed fullscreen" if you need the game all over your monitor) and use a text editor of your choice.

That's a great idea. I'd ad that it should be possible to access it during the building phase as well.

That way you'll have a handy place to write a flight guide in case the rocket or aircraft needs special handling. Not to mention a place to write which action group does what.

There's a mod that does this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55625

I use this to plan out my missions and create flight plans (using the KSP Trajectory Optimizer) Really handy!

I think it's a little redundant.

Nothing wrong with having it, but hardly a priority
